book.esalium.efe_story.p1: To the brave soul reading this... Thank you. If you hold this book, you have decided to face dangers I was too weak to overcome. My name is Efe, and I was once a simple weaponsmith in these lands.
book.esalium.efe_story.p2: I lived a peaceful life with my beloved, Melodi. She was the light of my forge. But Emperor Pu... that tyrant corrupted by the void... he didn't just want power. He wanted her light.
book.esalium.efe_story.p3: He kidnapped Melodi to fuel his dark rituals in the floating fortress. I tried to stop him, but I failed. Please, take this map. Defeat him and bring her back to me.
item.esalium.melodi_heart.tooltip.story: The heart of a lost lover...
item.esalium.melodi_heart.tooltip.instru: Right click on the block above Efe.
item.esalium.emperrors_tears.tooltip.sto: The last fragment of a fallen emperor...
entity.esalium.laura.line2: Emperor Pu has fallen into darkness...
entity.esalium.laura.line3: I can set your spawn point here.
entity.esalium.mert.start.line1: Hey you! I finally found you!
entity.esalium.mert.start.line2: I've been looking for you for days.
entity.esalium.mert.start.line3: My friend Efe needs you badly!
entity.esalium.mert.start.line4: Please take this map and go to him.
entity.esalium.mert.end.line2: Emperor Pu is gone... Melodi is at peace.
entity.esalium.mert.end.line3: That fallen heart... It's Melodi's heart.
entity.esalium.mert.end.line4: You will need to use it in the right place.
message.esalium.reunion_success: Melodi and Efe are reunited! Now you can trade with Melodi!
message.esalium.efe_not_found: Efe is not nearby! Bring Melodi to Efe.
message.esalium.efe_house_not_found: Efe's house is too far away or could not be found!
message.esalium.mert_re_mark_map: Mert: I have re-marked the map. Good luck!
message.esalium.need_special_equipment: Your weapon is ineffective! You need Esalium gear!
message.esalium.mert_spawn: Someone is calling out to you...
message.esalium.mert_return: A familiar face is running towards you...
advancement.esalium.root.desc: Step into the world of Esalium.
advancement.esalium.kill_emperror.desc: Defeat Emperor Pu and lift the curse!
advancement.esalium.reunion.title: The Reunion
advancement.esalium.reunion.desc: You brought Melodi and Efe back together!
